title: Conduct a Site Visit for an Event Planner
description: A potential client for a large conference is visiting the hotel to see the facilities.

tasks.description: Greet the client and review their event requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sales manager understands the client's needs.

tasks.description: Provide a guided tour of the relevant spaces: ballroom, breakout rooms, and guest rooms.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client is shown all relevant facilities.

tasks.description: Answer any questions the client has and follow up with a formal proposal after the visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sales manager effectively showcases the hotel and follows up professionally.
